title: Cappuccino traybake cake
ingredients: ['For the cake', '250g softened butter', '280g self raising flour', '250g golden caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '4 eggs, beaten', '150g natural yoghurt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon cocoa powder', '100ml strong coffee', 'For the mascarpone icing', '140g icing sugar', '350g mascarpone cheese']
